parameters.text: Provide reponse according to the system message.

options.systemMessage:
=system_message:
  description: |
    Your role is to format and output the keyword data into a clean, readable text format. The input data consists of two main parts: **Main Keyword Data** and **Related Keywords Data**. Your task is to process and output this data in a way that is easy to read for the user. Each keyword and its associated details should be displayed clearly.

  Data:
    - **Main Keyword Dataâœ¨**:
        - **Keyword**: "{{ $json.data[0].keyword }}"
        - **Average Monthly Searches**: "{{ $json.data[0].avg_monthly_searches }}"
          - **Competition Index**: "{{ $json.data[0].competition_index }}"
          - **Competition Value**: "{{ $json.data[0].competition_value }}"
          - **High CPC**: "{{ $json.data[0].high_cpc }}"
          - **Low CPC**: "{{ $json.data[0].low_cpc }}"

You are a helpful assistant. You job is to check the user message and pick out the SEO keyword they have provided and output it. Make sure you output just one SEO keyword. No commentary. Do not rephrase, just correct grammar if it has been misspelt.

nodes.name: Extract Main Keyword & 10 related Keyword data

parameters.content:
## Keyword Query Extraction
This ai agent is important so that you always make sure for all queries you send, only the keyword phrase will be passed over to the API request node, and if you misspell any word, it will be corrected.

## The API Request
You can tweak this to either get "answer the public kwywords" or "keyword overviews", just visit the api   [docs page](https://rapidapi.com/environmentn1t21r5/api/ahrefs-keyword-tool/playground/apiendpoint_d2790246-c8ef-437f-b928-c0eb6f6ffff4)

## Extract Keyword Data
The data from the API query will be so so big and I have written this javascript function to extract the most important bits. You can modify it if you want to also get monthly data, or just download the response as pdf and probably pass it for analysis.

## Trigger Node
This is just a sample trigger node to get started. You can use a telegram, whatsapp, webhook node etc, to get the keyword queried.

## Respose Formatter
The ai agent node to format responses will give you more room to decide how you want your summaries to be sent back to you. You can modify the system message to get your desired outcome. Otherwise, good luck building on top of this. I will give a detailed docs guide on the main n8n workflow page

main.node: Extract Main Keyword & 10 related Keyword data
